episodes.title: Lori Vallow Daybell Trial - Shocking Revelations & Courtroom Drama
episodes.description:
Join us for an exclusive live coverage of the Lori Vallow Daybell trial in Arizona, where she faces charges of conspiracy to commit murder in the death of her fourth husband, Charles Vallow. Lori Vallow Daybell, known as the "Doomsday Cult Mom," is representing herself in this high-stakes trial. Idaho prosecutor Rachel Smith already presented a murder case against Vallow Daybell and won, now she's weighing in on how the trial is going in Arizona. 

Subscribe for more live coverage and in-depth analysis of the Lori Vallow Daybell trial and other major cases. Hit the bell icon to get notified whenever we go live!

#lorivallowdaybell #truecrimestories #truecrimepodcast #doomsdaymom #utah #arizona #idaho 
Socials for KSL TV: 
https://twitter.com/KSL5TV
https://www.facebook.com/ksltv
https://www.instagram.com/kslnews/

episodes.title: LIVE from the KSL Stream Center: Lori Vallow Daybell reveals "the truth"
episodes.description: Join Shara Park KSL and Garna Mejia in the KSL Stream Center as we delve into the chilling case of Lori Vallow Daybell, the mother convicted of murdering her two children and conspiring to kill her husband's first wife. In an exclusive jailhouse interview with Dateline NBC's Keith Morrison, Lori Vallow Daybell breaks her silence, claiming she and her husband Chad Daybell will be exonerated. We'll explore the shocking revelations from the interview and why Morrison told KSL "it felt weird" but "I would do it again." Don't miss this gripping discussion on one of the most notorious true crime stories of our time.

episodes.title: KSL STREAM CENTER  Behind the Lori Vallow Jailhouse Interviewmp4
episodes.description: Join Shara Park KSL and Garna Mejia in the KSL Stream Center as we delve into the chilling case of Lori Vallow Daybell, the mother convicted of murdering her two children and conspiring to kill her husband's first wife. episodes.description: Dateline's Keith Morrison talks to Garna Mejia about his exclusive jailhouse interview with Lori Vallow Daybell. #lorivallowdaybell

episodes.title: Looking back: Lori Vallow Daybell trial closing arguments
episodes.description:
Before the jury in the trial of Lori Vallow Daybell went into deliberation, the prosecution and defense each made their closing arguments, reiterating what they had said in their opening arguments and pointing at testimony they felt proved their case. 

Read more about the closing arguments: kslnewsradio.com/2005594/money-power-sex-idaho-prosecutors-ask-jury-to-convict-slain-kids-mom-in-alleged-doomsday-plot/

episodes.title: Looking back: The Trial of Lori Vallow Daybell - Week 5
episodes.description: The prosecution appeard to be nearing the end of its presentation on the fifth week of the Lori Vallow Daybell trial. KSL NewsRadio reporters Aimee Cobabe and Hugo Rikard-Bell checked in with Kyle Dunphy of the Deseret News.

episodes.title: Looking back: The Trial of Lori Vallow Daybell - Week 4
episodes.description:
Week 4 was a busy week in Boise at the trial of Lori Vallow Daybell. KSL NewsRadio's Hugo Rikard-Bell and Aimee Cobabe broke down the latest in this weekly Q&A.

This video was originally livestreamed on April 28, 2023.

episodes.title: Looking back: The Trial of Lori Vallow Daybell - Week 3
episodes.description:
KSL NewsRadio reporters Aimee Cobabe and Hugo Rikard-Bell talk about all the developments in the third week of the trial of Lori Vallow Daybell. 

Former FBI Investigator Greg Rogers joins for further analysis.

episodes.title: Looking back: The Trial of Lori Vallow Daybell Week 2
episodes.description:
Wrapping up the second full week of the trial of Lori Vallow Daybell -- and the first week of testimony from witnesses. Reporters Aimee Cobabe and Hugo Rikard-Bell have been covering it all.

This video originally aired on April 14, 2023

episodes.title: Looking back: The Trial of Lori Vallow Daybell Week 1
episodes.description:
Reporters Aimee Cobabe and Hugo Rikard-Bell break down the first week of the Lori Vallow Daybell trial, with the help of defense attorney and KSL legal analyst Greg Skordas

This video originally streamed on April 7, 2023.

episodes.title: Lori Vallow Daybell deemed fit to stand trial in Arizona for death of estranged husband
episodes.description:
A woman who conspired to kill her two children is competent to stand trial in the Arizona death of her estranged husband as well. 

Read more: https://ksltv.com/?p=712853

episodes.title: CHOPPER 5: Daybell's Rexburg home demolished by new owners
episodes.description:

episodes.title: Chad Daybell's home near Rexburg has been demolished

episodes.title: INTERVIEW: Chad Daybell juror and alternate juror speak about the difficult 9-week trial
episodes.description:
Juror Daynna Skiver and alternate juror Lori Horne spoke to KSL TV's Andrew Adams about the difficult 9-week trial and sentencing of Chad Daybell over the murders of his former wife Tammy Daybell as well as wife Lori Vallow’s children, J.J. Vallow and Tylee Ryan. 

Read more: https://ksltv.com/652169/daybell-jurors-speak-publicly-about-death-penalty-decision/

---
Daynna Skiver Interview - 00:00
Lori Horne Interview - 08:52

episodes.title: Daybell jurors speak publicly about death penalty decision
episodes.description:
Two days after a jury sentenced Chad Daybell to death for three murders, jurors spoke publicly for the first time about their death penalty decision.

Read more: https://ksltv.com/652169/daybell-jurors-speak-publicly-about-death-penalty-decision/

episodes.title: Chad Daybell trial: Jury returns sentencing
episodes.description:

episodes.title: Jurors plan to return Saturday to continue deliberating Chad Daybell sentence
episodes.description:

Read more: https://ksltv.com/651331/jurors-plan-to-return-saturday-to-continue-deliberating-chad-daybell-sentence/

episodes.title: COURT HEARING: Prosecution, defense give arguments for and against death penalty Chad Daybell trial
episodes.description:

episodes.title: Chad Daybell discussed finances with daughter after his arrest: ‘I’m not coming back’
episodes.description:
On the third day of testimony in the Chad Daybell triple murder trial, law enforcement officers took the stand to explain their observations surrounding Daybell’s arrest on June 9, 2020.

Read more:https://ksltv.com/637728/chad-daybell-discussed-finances-with-daughter-after-his-arrest-im-not-coming-back/

episodes.title: COURT HEARING: Chad Daybell’s conversation with daughter, Daybell children’s bodies found
episodes.description:
Never before seen footage of Chad Daybell speaking with his daughter, Emma Murray, on the day the children’s bodies were found was shown to the jury during day 3 of Chad Daybell’s murder trial. 

Chad was arrested after driving away from his property in Fremont County, Idaho, on June 9, 2020. He was sitting in the back of the patrol car when his daughter came over to talk to him. The father and daughter talked about Emma handling his finances, the discovery of human remains, etc.
 
You can read the full story here: https://ksltv.com/637728/chad-daybell-discussed-finances-with-daughter-after-his-arrest-im-not-coming-back/

episodes.title: The Chad Daybell Trial: Defense's opening statements
episodes.description: Chad Daybell’s defense attorney, John Prior, gives his opening statements in the case of Chad Daybell, who is accused of first-degree murder, insurance fraud, and conspiracy to commit murder in the deaths of Tammy Daybell, 7-year-old Joshua "JJ" Vallow, and 16-year-old Tylee Ryan.

episodes.title: The Chad Daybell Trial: Prosecution's opening statements
episodes.description:
Prosecutor Rob Wood gave his opening statements about Chad Daybell, the man accused of first-degree murder, insurance fraud, and conspiracy to commit murder in the deaths of Tammy Daybell, 7-year-old Joshua "JJ" Vallow, and 16-year-old Tylee Ryan.

episodes.title: Police documents reveal new details in Tammy Daybell case
episodes.description:
Detectives suspect Charles Vallow’s discovery of his wife Lori Vallow’s affair with Chad Daybell led to his murder.


https://ksltv.com/474057/police-documents-reveal-new-details-in-tammy-daybell-case/?

episodes.title: Applying Evidence To 3D Model Of Chad Daybell's Property
episodes.description: Visual Law Group president Mark Johnson sees three advantages to the use of 3D renderings in the courtroom: education, persuasion and emotion.

episodes.title: New Charges Filed Against Chad Daybell
episodes.description: New charges were filed against Chad Daybell in Idaho Wednesday in connection to the deaths of Tylee Ryan and JJ Vallow.

episodes.title: Satellite Photo Shows Chad Daybell Property On Likely Day Of Child's Burial
episodes.description: A satellite captured a photograph of Chad Daybell's property on the outskirts of this eastern Idaho community just hours after police believe Daybell and Alex Cox finished burning and burying the remains of 16-year-old Tylee Ryan on Sept. 9, 2019.

episodes.title: Tammy Daybell Investigation: Idaho Law Allowed Her Burial Without An Autopsy
episodes.description: As investigations continue at Chad Daybell's Idaho property, officials said Tammy Daybell's death didn't require an autopsy under Idaho state law.

episodes.title: Retired FBI Agent Not Surprised Daybell Details Slow To Emerge
episodes.description: Friday marked three days since local and federal law enforcement converged on Chad Daybell’s property outside of Rexburg, Idaho, and other than prosecutors disclosing two sets of children’s remains were unearthed, few official details had emerged.

episodes.title: Neighbors Respond To Discovery Of Human Remains On Daybell Property
episodes.description: The discovery of the remains buried behind Chad Daybell's home was heartbreaking news for people throughout the Rexburg, Idaho, area.

episodes.title: Chad Daybell Arrested After Human Remains Found On Property, Police Say
episodes.description: Chad Daybell has been arrested and booked into jail on a felony charge after human remains were found on his property, Idaho police said.

episodes.title: Year in Review - The Trial of Lori Vallow Daybell
episodes.description: The case of Lori Vallow Daybell, who in April went to trial for the murders of her two children, and conspiracy to murder her husband's late wife. Specialist Lauren Steinbrecher explains why people from around the country swarmed the courthouse for the several-week trial, waiting for that final verdict.

episodes.title: Chad Daybell trial will be broadcast with certain restrictions, judge rules
episodes.description: An Idaho judge ruled Wednesday, Nov. 28, 2023, that Chad Daybell's trial will be broadcast with certain restrictions.

episodes.title: The Woodcocks speak ahead of Lori Vallow Daybell trial; judge deciding if they can sit in court
episodes.description:
The two people who sparked the entire investigation into JJ Vallow and Tylee Ryan's disappearance, may not be able to watch Lori Vallow Daybell's trial.

Read More: https://ksltv.com/537284/the-woodcocks-speak-ahead-of-lori-vallow-daybell-trial-judge-deciding-if-they-can-sit-in-court/

episodes.title: Lori Vallow’s brother suspected Charles Vallow was not her first victim
episodes.description:
Lori Vallow often bragged to her friends and family about a failed attempted murder of her third husband Joseph Ryan, according to detectives in Chandler, Arizona.


https://ksltv.com/474130/lori-vallows-brother-suspected-charles-vallow-was-not-her-first-victim/?

episodes.title: Prosecutors Debate Whether to Seek Death Penalty Against Chad Daybell & Lori Vallow
episodes.description: Both Chad Daybell and Lori Vallow have confirmed they will keep their lawyers for now, but that could change if prosecutors decide to seek the death penalty against the couple in the deaths of Tammy Daybell, JJ Vallow, and Tylee Ryan.

episodes.title: Lori Vallow Daybell trial begins in Boise with jury selection
episodes.description: Lori Vallow Daybell's trial officially begins Monday. The 49-year-old is facing charges for the murders of her children and husband's late wife. For the first couple of days, the courtroom will remain closed to the public for jury selection.

episodes.title: After Lori Vallow Daybell's sentencing, her sister breaks silence
episodes.description:
The sister of convicted murder, Lori Vallow Daybell, broke her silence and shared an emotional tribute to her niece and nephew.

Read More: https://ksltv.com/573257/lori-vallow-daybells-sister-breaks-silence-after-sentencing/

episodes.title: Lori Vallow Daybell speaks during sentencing hearing
episodes.description: Lori Vallow Daybell chose to address the court during her sentencing hearing on Monday, the first time she has publicly spoken since being convicted of murdering her youngest children.

episodes.title: Lori Vallow Daybell sentenced to life in prison without parole
episodes.description: Lori Vallow Daybell was sentenced to life in prison without the possibility of parole for the murders of her two youngest children, JJ Vallow and Tylee Ryan, and conspiring to kill Tammy Daybell, her fifth husband, Chad Daybell’s previous wife.

episodes.title: Lori Vallow sentenced to life in prison
episodes.description: Lori Vallow Daybell was sentenced to life in prison without the possibility of parole for the murders of her two youngest children, JJ Vallow and Tylee Ryan, and conspiring to kill Tammy Daybell, her fifth husband, Chad Daybell’s previous wife.

episodes.title: Lori Vallow Daybell found guilty of murdering her children
episodes.description:
Lori Vallow Daybell was found guilty on each of the six counts she was facing related to a trio of killings that captured national attention from small-town Idaho.

Read More: https://ksltv.com/548854/lori-vallow-daybell-guilty-of-murder/

episodes.title: Woodcocks elated to get justice with guilty verdict
episodes.description:

episodes.description: LIVE: The jury in the Lori Vallow Daybell trial has reached a verdict. It will be read live in the courtroom at 12:45 p.m.

Monday will mark a significant day in the Lori Vallow Daybell trial, as opening statements are set to begin.

Jury selection continued Thursday during day four of the Lori Vallow Daybell trial in Boise.

episodes.title: Radicalized Religion: When did Lori Vallow Daybell's beliefs become dangerous?
episodes.description:
Lori Vallow Daybell and Chad Daybell went from seemingly mainstream members of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints to following and practicing beliefs far outside the official teachings and doctrine. Experts explain how radicalized religion comes to be and how it can turn dangerous or even deadly.

Read More: https://ksltv.com/538114/radicalized-religion-when-did-lori-vallow-daybells-beliefs-become-dangerous/

episodes.title: Why you won’t be able to watch live during Lori Vallow Daybell’s trial in Idaho
episodes.description:
The only way to get a live glimpse of the big moments and the subtle reactions during Lori Vallow Daybell’s trial is to snag a seat in the Ada County Courthouse. Legal experts tell KSL what that means for transparency and a fair trial.

Read More: https://ksltv.com/537581/why-you-wont-be-able-to-watch-live-during-lori-vallow-daybells-trial-in-idaho/

episodes.title: East Idaho News reporter shares how covering Lori Vallow Daybell case changed his life
episodes.description:
One reporter who's been with the Lori Vallow Daybell case since the very beginning is Nate Eaton with East Idaho News. KSL TV's Mike Headrick got a chance to sit down with him about the day his entire life changed.

Read More: https://ksltv.com/537602/east-idaho-news-reporter-shares-how-covering-lori-vallow-daybell-case-changed-his-life/

episodes.description:
A judge will decide if family members who plan on testifying can sit in the courtroom, namely Joshua "JJ" Vallow's grandparents Kay and Larry Woodcock.

https://ksltv.com/?p=536300

episodes.title: AUDIO: Chad Daybell called Az. funeral home the day Lori Vallow's husband fatally shot
episodes.description:
Chad Daybell called a funeral home in Arizona the day Charles Vallow was shot and killed by his brother in law.


https://ksltv.com/474886/audio-chad-daybell-called-az-funeral-home-the-day-lori-vallows-husband-fatally-shot/?

episodes.title: Autopsy for slain husband of Lori Vallow Daybell made public; death ruled a homicide
episodes.description:
The autopsy report for Charles Vallow -- late husband of Lori Vallow Daybell - is now public and states the death was a homicide with multiple gunshot wounds.


https://ksltv.com/473547/autopsy-for-slain-husband-of-lori-vallow-daybell-made-public-death-ruled-a-homicide/

episodes.title: Lori Vallow Assigned Death Penalty Qualified Attorney; New Motion Filed
episodes.description:
A new death penalty qualified attorney will be representing Lori Vallow. The announcement comes as her original attorney requested to dismiss the Grand Jury Indictment, charging her in the deaths of her children and Chad Daybell's first wife, Tammy.



https://ksltv.com/470633/lori-vallow-assigned-death-penalty-qualified-attorney-new-motion-filed/

episodes.title: Prosecutors To Seek Death Penalty In Murder Charges Against Chad Daybell
episodes.description:
Prosecutors announced Thursday that they will pursue the death penalty against Chad Daybell, who, along with Lori Vallow, has been accused of killing Vallow's children and burying their bodies in his backyard. Daybell has also been charged in the death of his previous wife, Tammy.


https://ksltv.com/470197/prosecutors-to-seek-death-penalty-in-murder-charges-against-chad-daybell/

episodes.title: Idaho Law Expert Explains Why Some Charges Against Vallow, Daybell May Have Been Dismissed
episodes.description: Prosecutors have dropped some lesser charges against Lori Vallow and Chad Daybell in the deaths of Tylee Ryan and JJ Vallow. Without hearing from prosecutors, it's hard to know why they did it. But a distinguished law expert from Idaho said it could be for a number of reasons.

episodes.title: Police Release Probable Cause Statement From Investigation Into Death Of Lori Vallow’s Prior Husband
episodes.description: Two days after Lori Vallow was indicted on a murder charge in connection with the death of her previous husband, Charles Vallow, officials with the Chandler, Arizona, Police Department released a probable cause statement from their investigation.

episodes.title: Lori Vallow Indicted On Murder Charge In Death Of Previous Husband
episodes.description: A Maricopa County Grand Jury in Arizona indicted Vallow Thursday with one count of conspiracy to commit first-degree murder for the death of her previous husband Charles Vallow.

episodes.title: Aunt Of Slain Idaho Child: Daybells' Indictment Is 'Day We've Been Waiting For'
episodes.description: The aunt of 17-year-old Tylee Ryan said hearing Chad and Lori Daybell had been indicted on murder charges was the moment a lot of people have been waiting for.

episodes.title: Neighbors Respond To Discovery Of Human Remains On Daybell Property
episodes.description: The discovery of the remains buried behind Chad Daybell's home was heartbreaking news for people throughout the Rexburg area.

episodes.title: Human Remains Found On Daybell Property Were Missing Children, Family Says
episodes.description: Family members said human remains found on Chad Daybell's Idaho property were identified by authorities as missing children JJ Vallow and Tylee Ryan.

episodes.title: Human Remains Found On Chad Daybell's Property
episodes.description: Chad Daybell has been arrested and booked into jail on a felony charge of destruction or concealment of evidence, according to Idaho police.

episodes.title: Exhumed Evidence: The Life & Death Of Tammy Daybell
episodes.description:
https://ksltv.com/432796/exhumed-evidence-the-life-death-of-tammy-daybell/?

As people across the country anxiously wait to learn whether Lori Vallow will post her $1 million bail in Idaho, friends and loved ones of Tammy Daybell – Chad Daybell’s late wife – are wondering what happened to the family they knew in Utah before they moved about five years ago.

episodes.title: Chad Daybell Expected To Speak About Missing Children Case Soon, Associate Says
episodes.description:
https://ksltv.com/432317/chad-daybell-expected-to-speak-about-missing-children-case-soon-associate-says/?

In the midst of this story, one of Chad Daybell’s supporters said he feels vindicated after speaking with the couple and said their truth is very different from the “sensationalist media narrative.”

episodes.title: Hawaii Resident Talks About Thrift Store Encounter With Chad Daybell
episodes.description: A Utah native in Hawaii said she was surprised Chad Daybell was willing to share so much about his plans to leave the island when she bumped into him at a thrift store.

episodes.title: Lori Vallow Found Unfit To Stand Trial Following Mental Health Evaluation
episodes.description: Lori Vallow-Daybell has been found unfit to stand trail after a mental health evaluation deemed her "not competent."

episodes.title: Chad & Lori Daybell Indicted On Murder Charges Related To Deaths Of JJ Vallow, Tylee Ryan
episodes.description: Prosecutors announced Chad Daybell and Lori Vallow have been indicted on first-degree murder charges related to the deaths of JJ Vallow and Tylee Ryan. Daybell was also indicted on a count of first-degree murder related to the death of Tammy Daybell.

episodes.title: Judge Rules Prosecutor In Lori Vallow Case Can Continue Representing State
episodes.description: A judge has decided against disqualifying the special prosecutor in the Lori Vallow and Chad Daybell case for the murders of Tylee Ryan and JJ Vallow, but he said he isn’t ruling out the possibility.

episodes.title: Arizona Police Investigating Death Of Lori Vallow's Third Husband
episodes.description: Officers with the Phoenix Police Department confirmed they are investigating the death of Joseph Ryan, Tylee Ryan’s father and Lori Vallow’s third husband.

episodes.title: Judge Lowers Bail For Lori Vallow In Madison County; $1M Bond Still In Place In Fremont County
episodes.description: Lori Vallow’s bond has been dropped from $1 million to $150,000 for one of the cases related to her dead children, but she still faces another significant bond, and will likely have to post bail for both before being released.

episodes.title: Police Release Gruesome Details In Investigation Of Lori Vallow, Chad Daybell
episodes.description: Idaho police have released a probable cause statement providing new details into the investigation and disappearance of JJ Vallow and Tylee Ryan.

episodes.title: Body Cam: Father Of Missing Idaho Children Says Lori Vallow 'Lost Her Mind'
episodes.description: Newly released body camera video from police in Arizona showed Charles Vallow, the father of the missing Idaho children, warning officers about his wife’s strange behavior months before he died and the children went missing.

episodes.title: Multiple Agencies Meet In SLC To Coordinate Vallow Investigations
episodes.description:
https://ksltv.com/432931/multiple-agencies-meet-in-slc-to-coordinate-vallow-investigations/?

Authorities from multiple agencies have come together in Salt Lake City under one roof for the first time since the search for Tylee Ryan and JJ Vallow began.

episodes.title: Idaho Authorities Allegedly Use Decoy Vehicle To Transport Lori Vallow
episodes.description: As authorities prepared an ankle bracelet for Lori Vallow ahead of her possibly posting bail, new details about the complex process surrounding her extradition from Hawaii to Idaho emerged, including the possible use of a decoy vehicle.

episodes.title: Lori Vallow’s Bail Reduced To $1M, Judge Sets Conditions For Release
episodes.description: A Madison County, Idaho, judge has reduced Lori Vallow’s bail from $5 million to $1 million and set various conditions for her release.

episodes.title: Arizona Police Investigating 'Suspicious' Email In Connection To Lori Vallow's Former Husband's Deat
episodes.description:
https://ksltv.com/432207/arizona-police-investigating-suspicious-email-in-connection-to-lori-vallows-former-husbands-death-1/?

Officers with the Chandler Police Department confirmed they are investigating a letter allegedly sent from Lori Vallow to Chad Daybell shortly before her former husband's death.
